name: Pristine Beach Package
description:
Imagine you're on a Beach on the North Shore of Oahu with your toes in the sand, the warm sun on your skin, and the ocean's mist and waves calmingly soothing your soul.  Imagine no more...
  This package includes a vibrant photo of a pristine beach (Papailoa) on the famous North Shore of Oahu, 8 oz. of golden Hawaiian sand, Shoreline seashells and tidal coral stones(2 oz.)... Perfect for decorating an empty dresser top or counter top, on a porch table or even as a center piece on a coffee table or dinner table. 
 However you want to put it to use is up to you, just know that you'll always have a bit of Aloha!

Photography by Joshua Sojot aka Dreadnockulars
Shells, stones and sand personally gathered by Joshua Sojot
